Posts.Content: On 1/5/2006 Margie f. wrote: hello all my sister was diagnosed recently with stage 2 breast cancer, and will be starting her chemo/radiation protocol this week. i am trying to find a new york city based naturopath to be in charge of her nutritional and alternative approaches to beating this disease. has anyone used or heard of a naturopath in the new york city area who they thought was fabulous? thanks, margie   Hi, sorry to hear about your sister. I live on long Island,my wife has stage 4 rectal cancer. She is being treated at Sloan Kettering in Manhattan.A very good friend of my was stage 4 colon & melanoma with mets to liver and lung, He was referred to herbal healer.com.  Marijah Mccain Naturopath,He was given less than one year to live. She put him on essiac 4 herb tea 2oz  3x a day. He is cancer free 5 years now. My wife has been on this tea now for 2 weeks,along with oral chemo, to my surprise our oncologist at Sloan encouraged us to put her on the tea.Check out her web site and the testemonials. Good luck to you
Posts.Title: Finding a Naturopath in New York City
